snippet.title: Baldi's Basics Plus Early Access Trailer [OFFICIALLY OFFICIAL]
snippet.description:
Baldi's Basics Plus is available NOW in early access!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1275890/Baldis_Basics_Plus/
Itch.io: https://basically-games.itch.io/baldis-basics-plus
Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/baldis-basics-plus/481026

Subscribe to Basically Games for future Baldi's Basics and Basically Games content!

It's like the original game, but PLUS!
The same cruddy edutainment horror type parody theme is back, but with hugely expanded gameplay features, including procedurally generated levels, field trip minigames, crazy random events, PLUS more characters, more items, and more chaos!
